physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 18 x 44, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (2) 41 x 27, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 21, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 58 x 25, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 50 x 18, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (6) 60 x 28, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 39 x 13, (A) 6 lines, (B) blank, (8) 48 x 29, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 26 x 21, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (10) 36 x 27, 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 35 x 25, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 22 x 29, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 70 x 41, (A) 8 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (14) 77 x 38, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, bottom margin, (15) 71 x 79, (A) 2 col., col i: 7 lines, col. ii: 4 lines, no margins (?), (B) traces, (16) 73 x 25, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank
